name: Fish 1: Fishing Break Limited Demo
description:
Welcome Fish Lovers!

This is a game where you need to escape from home to a fishing resort because your holiday there was cancelled.

This is a limited demo version for the game jam, "Pallet Jam 2" hosted by 8 bits to Infinity. A more complete demo and a full version will eventually be released

Credits:

All textures and code is by me
